import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import React,{Component} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import './App.css'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import Navbar from './Navbar.js' import Footer from './Footer.js' class Comment extends React.Component { state = { movies: [] } componentDidMount() { const ID = this.props.match.params.id console.log(this.props) axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/movies/${ID}`) .then(res => { const movies = res.data; this.setState({ movies }); }) } render() { return (
{this.state.movies.description}

{this.state.movies.ageRating}

{this.state.movies.cast}

{this.state.movies.director}

{this.state.movies.genre}
